scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains three items, 1925, 1987, and ca. 1988, pertaining to Erskine Caldwell. Included is a "Certificate of Marriage," March 3, 1925, for Erskine P. Caldwell and Helen C. Lannigan, completed and signed by Rev. Titus E. Davis. Other items include an electrostatic copy of a review of Caldwell's With All My Mightin the November 1987 issue of The Georgia Librarianand of a twenty page essay from an unknown publication "Oedipus Complex of Erskine Caldwell" by Kaname Imanaga.
